value:
You may correct me if I'm wrong, but
you seem to know a bit of etiquette.
Did you learn it where you're from?

I shall be a beautiful Mage General
like Lady Cecilia in due time. Oh, if
only my brother could see that day!

Oh! On close inspection, you look
twice as nice as I thought. But if you
take a look at me, you'll see that I—$k$pHey, are you listening to me?!

I am infinitely busy, of course, but I
always have time for you. But, please,
do me a favor and make it quick.

How to properly do this or that, such
as wearing fashions or dancing...
Why, it's all a cinch for me.

Ah. May I presume you to be
$Nu?$k$pYou have the great honor of
receiving a greeting from me,
in person.
It's only natural that I sparkle so!

I come from a fine bloodline, so
this is only expected.

What, nothing more? But that's
preposterous!

A fine lady must sparkle in both
strength and style.

I am Clarine, the very talented
daughter of Count Reglay of Etruria.
And who, may I ask, are you?

My word! Is it just me, or is nearly
every single person here sorely
lacking in etiquette?$k$pI don't mean you, of course.
Never you—for I have the sort of
manners never to say so!$k$pBut I must risk offense and tell
you the truth. People look to
you to set a higher standard.$k$pWhat? They do! All are quite aware
that if we don't use our napkins
properly, it will be anarchy!$k$pSo, because I am grateful for
everything that you do, I will take
you on as a special project.$k$pYou'll have manners coming out
your ears by the time I'm finished
with you. Won't this be fun?
えいっ！
それっ！
きゃああっ！
You beast!
Stop this at once!
What insolence!
Stand back!
Prepare to be dazzled!
Brother...
Uhuhu
I shall save you.
You must be grateful!
Do you need me for something? Whatever can it be?
Now, just who do you think you are, getting my attention that way!
I shall teach you the ways of superlative style.
A lady must always aspire to the highest standards of beauty.
Tea, with me... You know, I think I shall.
Yes?
Very well.
Shall we?
